description:
Medium humanoid (any race), any alignment
Rulers, nobles, merchants, guildmasters, and other wealthy individuals use spies to gain the upper hand in a world of cutthroat politics. A spy is
trained to secretly gather information. Loyal spies would rather die than divulge information that could compromise them or their employers.

On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.
The spy deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the
attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn't incapacitated and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack
roll.
